body: So, as everyone knows, the server has been lagging out like crazy recently... and crashing players.... and the servers themselves.... my question is... why? what's wrong with the server atm? :c It wasn't that bad before... just several BIG crashes... but now, I'm getting crashes all the time... the pings good... what's going on with the server host? did we decrease in RAM? o-o

title: Severe Server Lag Issues...

replies.body: I have lag when is more than 50 guys on the same match, maybe decrease the maximun players?
